thread.section_title: Driver Support Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Driver Support | driversupport.com | 3 of 213
thread.title: Cynthia Pigozzi
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Cynthia Pigozzi

author: Cynthia Pigozzi
title: Cynthia Pigozzi
text:
I ran the driver updates and now my computer does not work correctly. I can't see email attachments, hear my voicemails, open certain pages and see the content.
This service is a rip off and conveniently there is no one you can talk to in order to fix the issues that their program caused.
